metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6866 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: TypedArrays can be fallible and lacked proper exception handling. Thiscould lead to abuse in other APIs which expect TypedArrays to alwayssucceed. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
